  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Fiumi in Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Rivers in Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse in Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleuves en Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rios em Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποταμοί στην Ευρώπη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ríos en Europa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo è un LO riguardante i fiumi in Europa. E' un esercizio di collegamento con immagini dei fiumi e carte geografiche dei paesi.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we have an LO about rivers in Europe. It's a matching exercise with images of the rivers and maps of the countries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">fiumi</string>
            <string language="en">rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">carte geografiche</string>
            <string language="en">maps</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier haben wir ein NIEDRIGES über Flüsse in 
Europa. Es ist eine zusammenpassende Übung mit Bildern der 
Flüsse und der Karten der Länder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous avons un BAS au sujet des fleuves en 
Europe. C'est un exercice assorti avec des images des fleuves et
des cartes des pays.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós temos um BAIXO sobre rios em Europa. É 
um exercício combinando com imagens dos rios e dos mapas dos 
países.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ έχουμε ένα LO για τους ποταμούς στην Ευρώπη. 
Είναι μια ταιριάζοντας με άσκηση με τις εικόνες των ποταμών
και των χαρτών των χωρών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí tenemos un BAJO sobre los ríos en Europa. 
Es un ejercicio que corresponde con con las imágenes de los 
ríos y de las correspondencias de los países.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fleuves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποταμοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάρτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ríos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencias</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="x-t-lre">12-18</string>
            <string language="en">12-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Possiamo utilizzare questo LO  dopo aver appreso circa la posizione geografica dei paesi e dei fiumi europei . E' di auto per l'allievo che desidera ripassare le proprie conoscenze concernenti le problematiche geografiche in riferimento ai fiumi.</string>
            <string language="en">We can use this LO after learning about geographical view of the European countries and rivers. It helps students to revise knowledge about the gographical issues about rivers.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
